doc_class_description: A Court of Appeal judgment is a higher court ruling that reviews decisions of lower courts, shaping legal precedent and protecting citizens’ rights.

latest_doc_d.description: Lokupatabandige Janitha Harsha Premalal vs Prof. Anura Manathunga, Director General, Department of Archaeology, before Hon. R. Gurusinghe, J.
latest_doc_d.parties: Lokupatabandige Janitha Harsha Premalal vs Prof. Anura Manathunga, Director General, Department of Archaeology,
latest_doc_d.legistation: Article 140 of the Constitution Antiquities Ordinance as amended by Act No. 24 of 1998.
